text: NBC is an Russian pay television owned by NBCUniversal International Networks. The channel is available on Allente. The channel launched in the Baltics on 23 March 2009 and in Russia and CIS on 29 July 2009 as Telemundo but was rebranded as NBC on 22 February 2014. The channel aired shows from the US NBC dubbed in Russian. Due to the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine, the channel closed in Russia and Belarus on 23 February 2024 and was replaced by 2x2 Drama. title: NBC (Russian TV channel)
